● Antibiotic hman tur ● Sulfadimethoxine drugs. ● sulfamethazine, erythromycin, or tetracycline te pawh a hman theih
● Vaccine pek tur. Kar 5 an tlin a vawi khat, vawi khat chiu hnu kar 4 hnuah vawi khat leh, thla 10 an tlin ah vawi khat a bak chu kum khatah vawi hnih vaccine pek thin tur ● Vaccine hi a vun hnuaiah (Subcutaneous) in pek tur a ni ● Ar in leh a vel damdawi (disinfectant) hmanga tih fai thin tur
● Ar pui leh ar sual huai ah a tam bik ● An mit a tui ● Thawk harsa, hritlang awmna angin an awm ● Tawk harsa, thawk tumin an lu leh nghawng an an tun a, an dak awrh awrh thin. Lu thing nasa ● Hnap an ngah a, hei hian an tawk a ti harsa a, an awm a hnawk thin ● Bungrua hrang hrang natna hrik kai- arbawm, hmanrua te, ar enkawltu thawmhnaw, ar chawpek na atangin

● Arpui atangin ar note in an kai ● Ar in fai lo, leh ar awp keina fai lo leh thianghlim lo atangin ● Bungraw hrang hrang natna hrik kai atangin
● Ar vulh lai zawng zawng enkawl nghal tur a ni ● sulfonamides, antibiotics, leh antibacterials te hman tur a ni ● Vitamin leh electrolyte (ORS)pek thin tur
● Ar in leh a vel tihfai that ● Ar note awp keuna leh bungraw dang a fai tur a ni ● Ar note hriat chian leh certified chiah lak tur ● Chaw tha pek
● Clostridium botulinum tur (toxin) avangin natna a lang ● Tha hrui a khawih avangin Ar thla leh ke te a Zeng thin ● An hmul a phawkthlak zung zung theih ● Taksa ah tur a tam lutuk chuan darker 12-24 chhungin an thi thin
● Ar thi leh sa thi tawih atangin ● Tho leh thil lung te hian a tur (Toxins) an pai ● Ar chaw thianghlim lo leh tui thianghlim lo atangin
● Art hi leh tawih te paih vat tur ● Chaw hlui leh chhia te pek loh tur ● Tuisen-potassium permanganate (1:3000) an tui in tur a tlem te pawlh a tha
● He natna vang a thi ar chu halral vat tur a ni ● Chaw thing leh hmuar te, thlai tawih te ar pek loh tur ● Tho leh thosi ven tur ● Chaw thianghlim leh thar tha chiah pek tur
● Zawi leh ngui ● Chaw ei tha lo ● An chet zawngin na nei angin an awm ● Artui chhia a tam ● Ek tui, a dum deuh thin ● An ruh chuktuan a vung thin ● An ruh chuktuan a vung a, an kal tha thei lo ● An awm bawr a durh leh pan a awm ● Ar an tho chhuak thei lo ● Ke pem a awmin natna hrik a lut thin ● An ke phah a vung, hnai a awm thin ● An kal tha thei lo
● A natna tlentu hi Staphylococcus aureus a ni ● Pem ah natna hrik a lut thin ● Ar in chhuat fai lo leh tui chhe tling atangin an kai awlsam bik
● Novobiocin (350 g/ton) an chaw ah a pawlh theih a ni 5–7 pek tur ● Erythromycin and penicillin tui in tur emaw a chaw a pawlhin ni 3-5 te a pek theih bawk ● Viatmin pek

Eng Laiin nge Tûr pai Engnge a Tûr hming Eng ranin nge a Tûr hi hua Tûr hnathawh lanchhuahdan Tûr avanga harsatna nei enkawldan
Engtinnge a lanchhuah? ● A chi (seeds) ● Abrin ● Ran zawng zawngin an hua. Sakawrin an haw lehzual bik ● Chil chhuak nasa ● Hnap tam ● Luak ● Kawthalo nasatak thisen nena inpawlh ● Ka chhung ulcer ● Taksa khur zawih zawih leh thihna ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Demulcent ● Fluid therapy
● A kung pumpuiin Tur a ni ● Thiaminase ● Ran zawng zawngin an hua ● Chaw ei tui lo ● Luak ● Ek khal ● Lung (Heart) a khawih chhia a, hei hian harsatna hrang hrang a thlen thin ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Tur in hna a thawh rei tawh lutuk chuan enkawl dam hleihtheih a ni lo ● Thiamine injection ● Vitamin B-Complex injection

● Ran zawng zawngin an hua. Sakawrin an haw lehzual bik ● Luakchhuak ● Pumna ● Ha thial ● Hnungzang ti kum ● Kawthalo, thisen tel ● Jaundice (Vun rawng eng) ● No chhiat ● Taksa chau leh chezia mumal lo ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Activated charcoal ● Electrolytes i/v infusion
● A hnah (Leaf) leh a chi (Seed) ● Hyocyamine, Atropine & Hyoscine ● Ran zawng zawngin a Tur hi an hua ● Taksa chau/ngui leh Chaw ei tui lo ● Ka chhung ro leh tuihal huam huam ● Mit del emaw thil hmu fiah thei lo ● Chi-ai nasa leh chezia mumal lo ● Taksa vawt thlur leh taksa khur vak vak ● Taksa kua hrang hrang atangin tuihnang a chhuak ● Reilote (minute – darkar) chhunga thihna ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Ran chu chettir reng tum tur ● Artificial respiration ● Taksa chezia mumal lo a nasat chuan damdawi hmangin chiu zawi tur
● A hnah (Leaf) leh a par (Flower) ● Lysergic Acid Alkaloids ● Ran zawng zawngin an hua. Kel, Bawng note leh Beramin a Tur hi an haw lehzual bik ● Chil haw vak vak leh kawthalo ● Mit natna / thil hmuh harsatna ● Taksa khur leh chezia mumal lo ● Ran ke a zeng a, an tlusawp a, an thihpui mai thin ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Activated charcoal ● Thin chakna damdawi pek chhunzawm
● A kung pumpuiah Tur a awm vek ● Lantadenes ● Ran zawng zawngin an hua. Bawngin a Tur hi an haw lehzual bik ● Thin (Liver) a khawih chhia ● Eng chhun (Direct light) reng reng an vunin a hua ● Jaundice ● Mit vung ● Zunkawng thalo ● Eng chhun avangin an hmuiah te, an beng hmawrah leh taksa hmul awmlohnaah a pan khir vak thin ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● He Tur ei palh ran chu daihlimah dah reng tur ● Vun pan enkawl – pem thar damdawi, Himax etc ● Dextrose i/v infusion ● Thin chakna pek vat tur ● Activated charcoal ● A tuldan azirin antibiotics leh antihistamine pek tur
● A hnah (Leaves) leh a kuang (Stem) a Tur a awm ● Neriodorin, Neriodorein, Oleandrine, Neriene & Neriantine ● Ran zawng zawngin an hua ● Chaw ei duh lo leh luak chhuak ● Pumna leh kawthalo ● Lung (Heart) a khawihchhiat avangin Stroke a thlen thut thei ● Rang tak leh harsa taka thaw lak ● Taksa hmawr vawt, taksa khur vak vak leh zeng ● Ran chu a tlusawp a, reiloteah a thi zui mai thin ● Ran taksa atanga Tur lakchhuah – Luaktir emaw kawthuahna pek ● Demulcents ● Khuahkhirh theihloh khawpa taksa che vak vak a nih chuan chiu zawi tur ● Artificial respiration ● Calcium pek miah loh tur
Engin nge thlen? Engtinnge a darh? Engtinnge a lanchhuah?
Vawk note leh thanglaiah engtinnge a lanchhuah? Vawk puitlingah engtinnge a lanchhuah?
Eng damdawi hmanga enkawl tur nge? Engtia inven tur nge?
● Pesti-Virus ● Boruak che vel ah a leng/darh thei ● Vawk damlo leh damlai dahpawlhin ● Vawk chaw leh tui thianghlimlo atangin ● Khawsik sang ● Chhan awm lova chau leh ngui thut ● Kawthalo leh luak ● Mit na (Conjunctivitis) ● Beng leh hnar senduk ● Taksa chau leh thihna ● Damdawi bik a awm lo ● Natna hri dang ven nan Antibiotics hman theih a ni ● A hun taka Vawk Pul Hri Vaccine pek ● Damdawi (disinfectant) hmanga Vawk In tihfai ● Chaw tha (Compound Pig Feed) leh Vitamin pek ● Pawnlam mi tan Vawk In chhunga luh mai mai phal loh ● Vawk damlo reng reng kal hnaih loh tur
● PRRS hi natna hrik chikhat (Arteri-Virus) in a thlen a ni ● Vawk damlo chil, hnap, zun, ek leh chi (Semen) ● Vawk damlo leh damlai dahpawlh ● Boruak che vel ● Mihring leh lirthei che vel ● Chaw ei tui lo leh taksa chau ● Harsa ti tak leh rang takin an thaw thin ● An beng kawm, hnar leh hmun dang a lo senduk thin ● An mit bul vel a vung vak thin ● Chaw ei tui lo leh khawsik sang ● A hun hmaa vawk note thisa hrin emaw note chhiat ● Vawk thenkhat chu an lu a hai a, an tlu tawp thin ● Thihna hial a thlen thin ● Damdawi bik a awm lo ● PRRS Vaccine hi tun dinhmunah Mizoram-ah a awm lo ● Natna hri dang ven nan Antibiotics ● Damdawi (disinfectant) hmanga Vawk In silfai ● Chaw tha (Compound Pig Feed) leh Vitamin pek ● Pawnlam mi tan Vawk In chhunga luh mai mai phal loh tur ● Vawk damlo reng reng kal hnaih loh tur
● Tawngkam tlanglawna ‘Vawk Phar’ kan tih hi ‘Phar’ (Leprosy) tak tak a ni lova. Hrik avanga vun natna/thak lo awm mai ni in, hrik chihnih – Sarcoptes te leh Demodex te zinga engemaw zawk zawk in a thlen a ni ● Vawk phar leh pharlo dahpawlhin ● Vawk In thianghlim tawkloh vangin ● Vawk In bul vela hnim leh thingkung tam lutuk avangin ● Vun thak avanga chaw ei a tui lo ● Vun thak chu bangah an nawt a, vun chu a lo sen vak thin ● An taksa thenlaiah bawl sen tereuh te te a awm thin ● Bengchhung thak avangin an lu an thing vak vak thin ● Ivermectin (Injection/Oral) ● Cypermethrin (Vawk bualna) ● Vitamin supplements ● Vawk chengho zingah pakhatin a kai palh a nih chuan an zavaiin damdawi pek tur ● Vawk In leh vela hnim bukte sam fai ● Vawk In nitina silfai ● Karkhatah vawikhat tal damdawi (disinfectant) hmangin Vawk In tleuhfai ● Vawk bulah ran dang (ui, zawhte, ar etc) tlattir loh
● Clostridium tetani ● Ran zainana hmanraw thianghlimlo hmanin ● Pem leh zaina hnuhma enkawl thianghlim tawk lohvin ● Ran pem emaw zaina hnuhmaa hlum (lei) bel hnanin ● Khawsik sang tak ● Taksa khawng ● Ka (mouth) hnuailam a khawng tlat thin ● Tetanus tihdamna damdawi a awm lo ● Tetanus a thlen loh nan fimkhur a ngai ● Pem leh zaina hnuhma thianghlim taka enkawl ● Pen leh zaina hnuhma thawmnan hlum (lei) hman loh tur. Antiseptic ointment (Himax, Skin Heal etc) hman zawk tur
● Rulhut ● Rulhut tui (egg) chu vawk ek atangin a chhuak a, hei hian chaw leh tui a ti thianghlimlo thin ● Chaw leh tui thianghlimlo atangin ● Chaw (a bikin hnim hring) chhum hmin tawkloh ● Chaw ei tui lo ● Taksa thang tha thei lo leh thau thei lo ● Taksa ti zauthauin vawk thenkhat chu an awm hle hle theilo ● Ivermectin ● Albendazole ● Fenbendazole ● Thla hnih danah tal Vawk Rulhuthlo pek ngei ngei ● Vawk chaw chhum hmin that ● Vawk In leh a velah ran dang tlattir loh ● Vawk In leh a vel thianghlim leh fai taka enkawl
Hnimhring tûr neite ● Calcium tlakchhamna ● Vawkpui railai taksa a Calcium chu nasa takin Vawk note in ruhrel siamnan a hip ● Vawk note an pianchhuah hnu lawkah Calcium tlakchham avang hian an tluksawp phah thin ● No neih hnu lawka Vawkpui tlusawp ● Vawkpui chu hrisel leh harh tak, mahse dingchhuak thei lo ● Calcium Borogluconate drip khai ● Vawkpuiin no a pailai thla 3-na atangin nitinin Calcium Supplement pek tan tawh tur ● Calcium supplement hi Vawkpuiin no a chawmlai thlengin a hnutetui tih tamnan a pawimawh a ni
HMANDAN TUR REMARKS
Natna leh hri Ar ● Tuiso litre 1 + Soda Thirfiante 2 ● Hei hian natna hrik tamtak a that thei ● A chak em em lo
Vawk ● Tui 4 litre + Chinai Kg chanve + Phenol Bottle chin khat ● Hei hian natna hrik tamtak a that thei ● A chak hle ● Siamsa hun reitak chhung dah chuan a chakna a tlahniam thei ● Chinai ro ● Chinai ro hi ran in chhuat vela thehin natna hri tamtak a thah theih ● Kutkawr (glove) hman tur
● Tui litre 10 + Tuisen powder thirfiante 1 ● Natna hrik tamtak a that thei ● Tuisen powder hi a man a to loh avangin hman tlanglawnber a ni
● Tui litre 10 + Phenol bottle chin 1 ● Natna hrik tamtak a that thei ● Thir (metallic objects) tihfainan him takin a hman theih
● Sodium Hydroxide 2 gm + Tui 10 litres ● Natna hrik tamtak a that thei ● Thir (Metallic objects) a ti tui-ek thei
● A ro (dry) in a hman theih. Ran in chhuat leh bang velah theh mai tur a ni ● Natna hrik tamtak a that thei a ● Vun tan a hriselloh avangin kutkawr (glove) hman thin tur a ni
